label: Homepage
title: Mender.AI
description: The premier legacy code strategy guide for the AI age

items.title: Mending is The Future
items.description: The future of software is synonymous with the future of software maintenance. For AI to advance the software industry, it must address the full lifecycle.

items.title: Better Together
items.description: Large Language Models (LLMs) offer unique value, not a replacement for humanity. We must learn how to complement our capabilities with theirs as part of a healthy system.

items.title: Get Involved
items.description: Like what you hear? Subscribe for updates or become the next signator of the Mechanized Mending Manifesto!
